name: Can I Sleep Now?
description:
Fancy a good long night sleep? 

Well, you better help your brain avoid those grown-up ass responsibilities. 

Washing the dishes, paying the bills, call your in-laws.

Ugh.

Collect as many positive vibes and gain some good sleep!

--------------------------

Move around to dodge bad thoughts and collect positive vibes.

--------------------------

Thought, loved & developed by Lafayenbros.
